meanings.definition: Unable to be quenched or satisfied.
meanings.sent1: Her quenchless thirst for knowledge led her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent2: The fire's quenchless flames burned brightly throughout the night.
meanings.sent3: His quenchless appetite for pizza made him order three extra-large pies.
meanings.sent4: The quenchless desire for success fueled her determination to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent5: The quenchless longing for adventure drove him to explore new lands.

meanings.sent1: The quenchless curiosity of the cat led it to investigate every corner of the house.
meanings.sent2: His quenchless ambition pushed him to strive for greatness in his career.
meanings.sent3: The quenchless enthusiasm of the fans made the concert an unforgettable experience.
meanings.sent4: The quenchless love for music in her heart inspired her to become a talented musician.
meanings.sent5: The quenchless determination of the team to win the championship motivated them to train harder than ever before.
